item.title: About Kris
item.description: His name is Kristianto Karim. He started this page with intention to learn about writing, improve his english, and communicate better. He currently is one of backend software engineer at Traveloka Indonesia. He hate talking about himself in third person. He loves programming and playing games. Now he is trying to love reading and writing. Thanks for reading!

item.title: Contact
item.description: Want Contact? Have questions or anything to tell Kris ? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub or email him.
